[OTel] Kubelet Stats Receiver Metrics Container CPU Usage

attributes.description: The diagram shows the average CPU Usage by Pod. Each bar is separated by the contributions of the containers of the pod. Containers appearing in different pods are depicted by the same color.
attributes.title: [OTel] K8s Average Container CPU Usage per Pod

attributes.title: [OTel] K8s Memory Caption Vega

attributes.description: The diagram shows the average Memory Usage by Pod. Each bar is separated by the contributions of the containers of the pod. Containers appearing in different pods are depicted by the same color.
attributes.title: [OTel] K8s Average Container Memory Usage per Pod

attributes.description: Memory Usage of the top 10 containers of the top 3 pods over time in MebiBytes.
attributes.title: [OTel] K8s Container Memory Usage

attributes.description: Memory Usage by Pod in MebiBytes.
attributes.title: [OTel] K8s Pod Memory Usage
[OTel] K8s Filesytem Caption Vega

attributes.description: The diagram shows the maximal Filesystem Usage by Pod. Each bar is separated by the contributions of the containers of the pod. Containers appearing in different pods are depicted by the same color.
attributes.title: [OTel] K8s Top 10 Max Filesystem Usage
[OTel] K8s Container Filesystem Available Below Limit

attributes.description: List of Pods with critically low filesystem available. Should be empty.

attributes.description: Filesystem Usage per Pod in MebiBytes.
